title: "A Dialogue with Luigi Einaudi Is Now Possible, Thanks to Artificial Intelligence"
excerpt: "Fondazione Luigi Einaudi Onlus of Turin, Fondazione Compagnia di San Paolo, and Reply present \"Pensiero Liberale, Dialogo Attuale\" a project that uses artificial intelligence to make the economic thought of one of the most relevant personalities of the 20th century accessible to all through a conversation with a digital version of him."
